PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-08652012-06-19,  ,  ,  TC, 
ActCanada Transportation Act
SubjectGateways and Border Crossings Fund contribution program
PrecisOrder (1) repealing Order in Council P.C. 2009-0644 of April 23, 2009; and (2) authorizing the Minister of Transport to enter into contribution agreements in an amount not to exceed $1,500,000,000 per recipient, for the purpose of implementing the GATEWAYS AND BORDER CROSSINGS FUND CONTRIBUTION PROGRAM.
AttachmentsAttachment
